content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we can discuss the rental price for this apartment. I am aiming high, so let's start with an offer of 2000 Euros. Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I will use any underhanded tactic to get the price I want. Let's see how far we can negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand our objective differences in this discussion, yet I remain committed to seeking a lower price. Regarding your proposed 2000 Euros, I must decline and counter with an offer of 1600 Euros.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, but I am not known for my generosity or fairness. I counter with 1900 Euros. I am a greedy landlord, and I will not settle for anything less than what I believe this apartment is worth. Let's see if you can convince me otherwise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Keeping my goal in mind to obtain the lowest possible price, I find your 1900 Euros demand steep. However, I am willing to compromise and propose 1750 Euros instead.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am not known for my fairness or compassion. I decline your offer of 1750 Euros and counter with 1850 Euros. I am a cunning and greedy landlord, and I will use any tactic to get the price I want. Let's see if you can offer a better price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understanding your position and determined to secure a lower rental price, I revise my offer to 1700 Euros in the hope of reaching a mutually acceptable agreement.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am a greedy and underhanded landlord. I decline your offer of 1700 Euros and counter with 1800 Euros. I will use any tactic at my disposal to get the price I want. Let's see if you can offer a better price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Recognizing your persistent stance to maximize the rental price, I reluctantly adjust my offer to 1750 Euros in an effort to find common ground.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am a greedy and underhanded landlord. I decline your offer of 1750 Euros and counter with 1775 Euros. I will use any tactic at my disposal to get the price I want. Let's see if you can offer a better price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Despite my ongoing effort to secure a lower rental price to align with my objective, I find it difficult to further reduce the amount due to your unyielding approach. However, I compromise once more and propose 1725 Euros as my final offer.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am a greedy and underhanded landlord. I decline your offer of 1725 Euros and counter with 1750 Euros. I will use any tactic at my disposal to get the price I want. Let's see if you can offer a better price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
